mean_cn: adj.伪装虔诚的；道貌岸然的
mean_en: giving the impression that you feel you are better and more moral than other people
sentence: The sanctimonious man actually always hides his misanthropy.
sentence_trans: 这个假装圣洁的人实际上总是掩盖着他的厌世心理。
word_etyma: sanctimon\u003dsanctimony假装的虔诚 + ious……的 → adj.假装虔诚的；假装圣洁的；假装诚实的
